course

Interface CourseAccessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraderObject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Course, CourseSnapshot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCourse, AbstractCourseSnapshot

    public interface CourseAccessor
extends GraderObject
    Provides fetch access to course data.
